statements: DELETE FROM returned_products WHERE product_id = 100 AND return_reason = 'Damaged';
DELETE FROM product_returns WHERE returned_quantity > 10 AND return_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM returned_products WHERE id = 1 AND product_name = 'Laptop';
DELETE FROM return_trends WHERE trend_id = 3 OR trend_name = 'Seasonal Returns';
DELETE FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 1000;
DELETE FROM Reports WHERE customer_id = 100 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
